name: Last Name Of 'Cheers' Characters Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Malone.

	Ted Danson went on to enjoy a prolific career after playing Sam Malone for 11 seasons. He married actress Mary Steenburgen in 1995, and the couple was still together 19 years later (2014), played Dr. John Becker from 1998-2004, played a version of himself on 13 episodes of "Curb Your Enthusiasm", was the awful Arthur Frobisher for 23 episodes of "Damages", and starred as D.B. Russell on the original "CSI" TV series starting in 2011.

Howe.

	Kirstie Alley played Rebecca Howe. She went on to have a very public battle with her weight after her divorce from actor Parker Stevenson, and appeared to have conquered it by 2011. She appeared on two seasons of "Dancing With The Stars" and began a new series in 2013 called "Kirstie".

Chambers.

	Played by actress Shelly Long. Shelly went on to star as Carol Brady in the "Brady Bunch" films, as well as numerous other TV and film roles.

Boyd.

	Woody Harrelson played Woody Boyd after the actor who played Coach passed away. He went on to experience a great movie career. Some of his films are "White Men Can't Jump", "EDtv", "Indecent Proposal", "Natural Born Killers", "Seven Pounds", "Zombieland", and "The Hunger Games" series. In 2014 HBO began airing a series starring Woody and Matthew McConaughey, who had previously starred together in "EDtv".

Pantusso.

	Nicholas Colasanto passed away in 1985 at the premature age of 61. He had a heart attack.

Sternin.

	Bebe Neuwirth reprised her role as Lilith on the spin-off series "Frasier", in twelve episodes. She also enjoyed a great stage career in such works as "A Chorus Line" (1980), "Damn Yankees" (1994), and appeared on stage as Morticia Addams in a Broadway production of "The Addams Family".

questions.text: What was Melville's owner John's last name?
What last name was shared by Eddie and Carla?
questions.explanation:
LeBec.

	Rhea Perlman played Carla Tortelli LeBec, and Jay Thomas played Eddie.
